question: Consider the following about Devadasi system prevalent in some areas of India. 1. It is related to dedicating children to temples as an offering to appease the god. 2. It persists in Karnataka and Tamilnadu only. Which is/are true from the above statements?
explanation: Devadasi system is related to dedicating girls to temples as an offering to appease the god. It persist in Karnataka and Goa.
